articles.description: -  What is Bitcoin, how do you buy it and is it safe?- What is Dogecoin and why is the stock price going up?- What is Ripple’s XRP and why is the price going up
articles.content:
THE price of Bitcoin has surged to a new record high after two finance giants announced their own cryptocurreny projects.
The price of a single Bitcoin hit nearly $48,000 (£34,400) after the announc… [+14571 chars]
